PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-14592014-12-12JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectSamples of Bodily Substances Regulations
PrecisSAMPLES OF BODILY SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS in order to provide lawful authority to take bodily samples to ensure the enforceability of conditions to abstain from the consumption of alcohol or drugs which are included in a great number of probation orders, conditional sentences and peace bonds.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0304 Publication Date: 2014-12-31
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Samples of Bodily Substances Regulations
precis: SAMPLES OF BODILY SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS in order to provide lawful authority to take bodily samples to ensure the enforceability of conditions to abstain from the consumption of alcohol or drugs which are included in a great number of probation orders, conditional sentences and peace bonds.
